title: Chaos Theory
description: Everything that can go wrong, has gone wrong. After reviving my daughter Abigale, we return to discover the North American Vampyr Court has been overthrown. Dark blood magiks are afoot and thousands of innocent vampyr now hang in the balance.With the horrible discoveries exacerbated by unexpected pregnancies around me. I feel as if my friends and family are ripe to turn on one another. My father's retreated into his sorrow at the final loss of my mother.To make matters worse, something has risen from Hel's realm, as the afterlife collapses. The massive figure and the loose zombie hordes call entirely too much attention to the immortal community.With our secrets exposed to the light of day. I will work tirelessly to prove to humans that we are not their enemies. Now, I just have to figure out how to deal with the cascading assortment of world-ending problems on my hands!Book Six in the Blood and Darkness Series. The beginning of a new chapter in the story.
author: Aria Storm
